D2 Item Set[edit]

Hwanin's Majesty is quite an underused set in D2X. It comprises four items, three of which are usable by the Desert Wolves mercenaries. The polearm (a bill) has a hefty amount of damage on it, with a valued full-set modifier of 20% life steal, a must for barbarians. When the set is complete, it gets 30% increased attack speed, but the set is not popular, for a number of reasons: the damage is not sufficient for hell difficulty, the belt has only twelve slots, and most importantly, the belt cannot be equipped to a mercenary, which prevents them from getting the IAS and life steal from the set.

It's only available in the Expansion.

Diablo II Item Info [e]
1.10
Ilvl: 28
Hwanin's Majesty
[Item Set]
Set Pieces:
Hwanin's Justice
Hwanin's Refuge
Hwanin's Splendor
Hwanin's Blessing
  • Two-piece Set Bonus:
    • +100 Defense
  • Three-piece Set Bonus:
    • +200 Defense
  • Full Set Bonus:
    • +2 to All Skills
    • +30% Faster Run/Walk
    • +20% Life Stolen Per Hit
    • +30% Resistance to All
    • +300 Defense
Slots Used:
  • Head
  • Chest
  • Main Hand
  • Off-Hand
  • Waist
Slots Free:
  • Neck
  • Hands
  • Ring 1
  • Ring 2
  • Feet
